summary.para: Gets a description of the resource.

param.name: pDesc1
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives the description of the unordered-access resource.

summary.para: An unordered-access-view interface represents the parts of a resource the pipeline can access during rendering.

remarks.para: To create a view for an unordered access resource, call .
All resources must be bound to the pipeline before they can be accessed. Call to bind an unordered access view to a compute shader; call to bind an unordered access view to a pixel shader.
